name: Polli
description:
Meditative game made for  the 2019 Epic MegaJam "Downto Earth.

Take control of a spore and spread some moss to this derelict landscape. 

Solo Team Name PolliTeam - Kiril Tchangov

Music Track by Eric Brannon - created prior to this competition

everything included was either grabbed from Quixel Megascans or made by me for this challenge.
